title: [Caffe2]How could I use caffe2
body_html:
• Caffe2:
  • OS: Ubuntu16.04
  • PyTorch version:
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda):
  • Python version:3.5
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:8.0/6.0
  • GPU models and configuration:
  • GCC version (if compiling from source):5.4
  • CMake version:

  • Versions of any other relevant libraries:
    How could I use caffe2 in pytorch ,what's the API to use caffe2???Because I want to type 'from caffe2.python import core'.
